ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: L.M., P.C. and W.N.S. carried out this work as part of the activities of the Research Network Natural Products against Neglected Diseases (ResNetNPND, http://www.resnetnpnd.org/Start/). P.S. and W.N.S. contributed to this project as part of the activities of the Aromatic Plant Research Center (APRC, https://aromaticplant.org/).
